title: What Is the criteria to give cbse improvement exam? - Quora
tags: Central Board of Secondary Education, India

response.answer_text: CBSE Improvement Exam is a way to improve your class 12th result by giving the CBSE Board exams again next year. Students can give improvement exam for one subject or all five subjects. Students cannot give improvement exam for additional subjects and practical examination marks will be carried forward. If in maths stream , apply for all subjects , jee do not accept improvement for 1 subject . P.S: The exam dates and question papers is same as regular CBSE board exams .

You must have passed in all the subjects in your CBSE boards exams. So, only passed students can apply to improve.You have to give improvement in the consecutive year of your boards (no gaps allowed) .You must not have taken admission in any undergraduate degree courses during the Improvement year. So, you kind of have to drop an year for improvement.
